pricing.info_text_2: Youâ€™ve been investing for a while. Invest more and grow your wealth faster.

alert.text_guide: Use this form to set up alerts for specific website performance metrics. You will receive notifications based on the frequency and criteria you specify. This helps in keeping track of your site's performance, accessibility, SEO, and PWA scores.
alert.info_url: Enter the URL of the website you want to monitor.
alert.info_email: Specify the email address to receive alerts.
alert.info_threshold: Set a threshold value to get indicator in email - if it falls below this value
alert.info_frequency: Choose how often you want to receive alerts.
alert.info_performance: Measures page load speed and user interaction.
alert.info_Accessibility: Evaluates usability for people with disabilities.
alert.info_PWA: Checks app-like features and offline functionality.
alert.info_SEO: Analyzes visibility and ranking in search results.

compare.text_guide: Use this form to compare key performance metrics between your website and your competitor's. This tool helps you understand how your site stacks up against competition in areas like performance, accessibility, SEO, and more.
compare.info_url: Enter the URL of your website to monitor and compare.
compare.info_competitor_url: Provide the URL of a competitorâ€™s site for benchmarking.
compare.info_email: Specify the email address where you want to receive analysis reports.
compare.info_select_category: Select the Metrics to monitor and compare.
compare.info_frequency: Choose how often you want to receive alerts.
